sourcesContent:
import { useState } from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; function BuildingSearch() { const [filters, setFilters] = useState({ location: '', priceRange: '', bedrooms: '', amenities: [], }); // Mock data with more realistic entries const buildings = [ { id: 1, name: "The University Commons", address: "123 College Ave, University City", price: "$800/month", bedrooms: "2", bathrooms: "2", amenities: ["Gym", "Pool", "Study Room", "In-Unit Laundry"], image: "https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1522708323590-d24dbb6b0267", rating: 4.5, distance: "0.2 miles to campus", available: "Fall 2024", description: "Modern apartment complex with premium amenities and spacious layouts.", }, { id: 2, name: "Campus View Apartments", address: "456 University Dr, College Town", price: "$1200/month", bedrooms: "3", bathrooms: "2", amenities: ["Parking", "24/7 Security", "Fitness Center", "Rooftop Lounge"], image: "https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1545324418-cc1a3fa10c00", rating: 4.8, distance: "0.5 miles to campus", available: "Fall 2024", description: "Luxury student living with stunning campus views and modern facilities.", }, // Add more mock data as needed ]; return (
{/* Back Button and Header */}
Back to Home

Find Your Perfect Place

Discover student-friendly apartments and housing options near your campus

{/* Filters Section */}
setFilters({...filters, location: e.target.value})} />
{/* Results Grid */}
{buildings.map((building) => (
{building.rating} ★
Available {building.available}

{building.name}

{building.address}

{building.distance}

{building.price}

{building.bedrooms} bed • {building.bathrooms} bath

{building.description}

{building.amenities.map((amenity, index) => ( {amenity} ))}
))}
); } export default BuildingSearch;
